title: Episode 77 -  McCarthyism And The Second Red Scare
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we outline Mccarthyism, talking about the movement's major players, events and consequences for the Cold War and the United States specifically.

For pictures for this episode and more go to our website at: 
https://www.historyofthecoldwarpodcast.com/

Want to skip the ads and get right to the content, become a patreon subscriber here:
